description: Reworked rhythm guitar parts, fixed bass, fixed drum beat, rewritten the solos, harmony track and solo track are now two diferent tracks for each player to allow for supperposition in mustaine's solo. written finger by finger and drumstick hit to drumstick hit based on the "Blood in the Water" live album
title: Kick The Chair

description: Harmony solo is not played like that look live shows.
title: Kick The Chair

description: Re-Tuned to original record tuning (E standard) Mustaine's solo re-done, transposed and improved harmonies and tempos.
title: Kick The Chair
